title: kaNDu kali
sahitya:
kaNDu kali tIrndEn karu mANikkamE karuNai mazhai pozhiyum kALamEghamE unaik-


anupallavi

  viNNavar vEdamum vandu paNindiDa vaNNamAit-tirumOgUr tannil urai unaik-


caraNam    tAlat-tAmarait-taTAkam nIrADi mILAp-piravikkaDal karai nADi
 tAL malar tanjam enrunait-tEDi nALumun pugazh pADik-koNDADik-
